\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Eliu \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Barachel|strong="H1292"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Buzite|strong="H0940"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w younger|strong="H6810"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* ancient; \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* hanging \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* head, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* shew \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w opinion|strong="H1843"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0403"\w*, as I \w see|strong="H0995"\w*, there \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H7307"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H0995"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w and|strong="H0995"\w* \w the|strong="H0995"\w* inspiration \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H0995"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* giveth \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w aged|strong="H2205"\w* \w are|strong="H4941"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w wise|strong="H2449"\w* \w men|strong="H2205"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* do \w the|strong="H3808"\w* ancients \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*: Hearken \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H0637"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* shew \w you|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* wisdom.

\w For|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w waited|strong="H3176"\w* \w for|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* given \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H8394"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w were|strong="H1697"\w* disputing \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0995"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* thought \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w thing|strong="H0561"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* considered: \w but|strong="H0369"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w*, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w can|strong="H0369"\w* convince \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w and|strong="H0995"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H6435"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath cast \w him|strong="H4672"\w* down, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H0413"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w according|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* afraid, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w left|strong="H5750"\w* off \w speaking|strong="H4405"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6030"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w waited|strong="H3176"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H0637"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w my|strong="H0637"\w* part, \w and|strong="H2506"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* shew \w my|strong="H0637"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1843"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* matter \w to|strong="H7307"\w* speak \w of|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bowels straiteneth \w me|strong="H0990"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* as \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w which|strong="H3196"\w* wanteth vent, \w which|strong="H3196"\w* bursteth \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* vessels.

I \w will|strong="H8193"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H1696"\w* take breath \w a|strong="H1696"\w* little: I \w will|strong="H8193"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w will|strong="H8193"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*.
